content:
Where does my shadow go 
When I'm asleep?
Does it rest till daylight?
Or does it creep
Away, to live nine lives
Out on the town?
Meeting other shadows — 
Getting it down?

You might think I'm crazy,
But I'm concerned.
My good reputation
Has been hard earned.
I don't want my shadow 
Being unfair —
Landing me in trouble
When I'm not there!
________________________
cleaned: does my shadow go when i m asleep does it rest daylight or does it creep away live nine lives out the town meeting other shadows getting it down you might think i m crazy but i m concerned my good reputation been hard earned i don t want my shadow being unfair landing me trouble when i m not there
